gov.va.med.srcalc.vista

Class RpcVistaPatientDao

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.RpcVistaPatientDao
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VistaPatientDao

    public class RpcVistaPatientDao
extends java.lang.Object
implements VistaPatientDao
    Implementation of VistaPatientDao using remote procedures. Each instance is tied to a particular user to avoid having to specify the user when calling each method.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface gov.va.med.srcalc.vista.VistaPatientDao

    • Method Detail

      • getPatient

        public Patient getPatient(int dfn)
        Loads a Patient from VistA given his/her DFN. This includes the patient's vitals and available lab measurements.

        This method will eager load all available information about the patient including vitals, basic information, and lab results. Eager loading is done to sacrifice efficiency for simplicity. The number of eager remote procedure calls is comparable to VistA CPRS.

        Specified by:
        getPatient in interface VistaPatientDao
        Parameters:
        dfn - the dfn identifying the specified patient

      • saveRiskCalculationNote

        public VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode saveRiskCalculationNote(int patientDfn,
                                                   java.lang.String electronicSignature,
                                                   java.lang.String noteBody)
        Description copied from interface: VistaPatientDao
        Saves the finished calculation to VistA, given the patient, electronic signature, and the note body. Each line of the noteBody is wrapped at VistaPatientDao.MAX_LINE_LENGTH characters so that the note is easily visible in CPRS without horizontal scrolling.
        Specified by:
        saveRiskCalculationNote in interface VistaPatientDao
        Parameters:
        patientDfn - the DFN of the patient
        Returns:
        one of the VistaPatientDao.SaveNoteCode return codes
